title: Be Careful of Long Autumn Nights
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Thank you for coming with me today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Don’t worry about it, I also had fun. I’m glad we found something you like.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah! I’m going to use this blanket we just bought right away.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It’s going to get colder from now, huh? Are you going to use it while you play the piano or something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s right. Usually, it can get pretty late without me noticing when I’m focused on composing a song. And it’s been so cold recently....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Be careful not to get a cold, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, I’ll be just fine with this blanket that we picked together today, Eli-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s a relief. Maybe I should also get one for Maki.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Waaah, I’m sure Maki-chan will be more than happy! Let’s pick one out together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah, sure. Let’s surprise her with it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
